title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the finish button in the JAR packager, an error message displays: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: The JAR packager fails to create the JAR file when there are unsaved open files.
EB: The JAR packager should validate and prompt the user to save any unsaved open files before proceeding with the JAR creation.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a file in the project. 
2. Make changes to the file without saving. 
3. Open the JAR packager for the project. 
4. Enter the necessary details such as path, destination, name, and description for the JAR packager. 
5. Press the finish button. 

Expected result: The JAR packager should validate the open files and prompt the user to save any unsaved files before proceeding with the JAR creation.
